attributes.action: Reroute prudential ride London out of Surrey
attributes.background: People in Surrey who work Sunday’s cannot get to work. This includes carers who have a duty to carry out. Some of the clients are inaccessible due to road closures and therefore do not receive their visits which can be life threatening as some are bed bound and cannot do anything for themselves.

rejection.details:
You can find out more about the organisers of Prudential RideLondon here: 
https://www.prudentialridelondon.co.uk/about/organisers/

The road closures are agreed with London borough councils and Surrey County Council. You can contact Surrey County Council about its road closures policy for sporting events here:
https://www.surreycc.gov.uk/roads-and-transport/permits-and-licences/public-events

You could also raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
